sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This script is to get new native mobile "Favorite" cards compatible with the next experience theme. This script should be run only if the instance is on Utah or post Utah family release.</description>
        <name>Mobile Next Exp - EC</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[//Switch runManually to true in order to run this script
var runManually = false;
if (runManually) {
    var util = new sn_me.MobileNextExpUpgradeUtil();
    upgradeFavoritesCard();
}

function upgradeFavoritesCard() {
    var favorites = [
        //favorites (with image)
        {
            "masterItem": "67d525ca773101108f64b2487b5a992e",
            "newCard": "737198bb777811109033bfeacf5a99ad",
            "oldCard": "d21629ca773101108f64b2487b5a9974"
        },
        //favorites (without image)
        {
            "masterItem": "a466a9ca773101108f64b2487b5a99f1",
            "newCard": "d5fb80b377f411109033bfeacf5a99e4",
            "oldCard": "de36e5ca773101108f64b2487b5a99ca"
        }
    ];

    favorites.forEach(function revertEachLink(link) {
        util.switchConnection("sys_sg_master_item", "view_config", link.masterItem, link.oldCard, link.newCard);
    });
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-08-23 16:03:59</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>e4046cb853651110fedfddeeff7b12e4</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Mobile Next Exp - EC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Employee Center" source="sn_ex_sp">4249e63a28d54d61bb6fbf61fd86cccb</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Employee Center">4249e63a28d54d61bb6fbf61fd86cccb</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_e4046cb853651110fedfddeeff7b12e4</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-08-25 10:10:00</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
